content.en: Egg quality assessment: Scientists have been exploring the use of algorithms to answer various questions related to egg freshness and quality. These algorithms, such as Support Vector Data Description and Independent Component Analysis, are being used in conjunction with technologies like NIR spectroscopy and hyperspectral imaging to detect freshness, predict S-ovalbumin content, identify egg abnormalities, and even determine the origin of eggs. The goal is to develop non-destructive and accurate methods for assessing egg quality, which could have important implications for the food industry.
content.da: Vurdering af ægkvalitet: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at besvare forskellige spørgsmål relateret til æggets friskhed og kvalitet. Disse algoritmer, såsom Support Vector Data Description og Independent Component Analysis, anvendes sammen med teknologier som NIR-spektroskopi og hyperspektral billeddannelse til at opdage friskhed, forudsige S-ovalbuminindhold, identificere ægafvigelser og endda bestemme æggets oprindelse. Målet er at udvikle ikke-destruktive og præcise metoder til vurdering af ægkvalitet, hvilket kunne have vigtige implikationer for fødevareindustrien.
